notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: The 1,2 adduct and the 1,4 adduct formed by reaction of HBr with 1,3-butadiene are in equilibrium at 40 °C. Propose a mechanism by which the interconversion of products takes place.
detailedSolution: Interconversion occurs by SN1 dissociation to a common intermediate cation.
